CustomField.description: This checkbox is to acknowledge customer data was removed from the Service Loaner product by the Field Service Engineer. Checked means it verifies that the hard drive of the Service Loaner has been re-imaged or replaced.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This checkbox is to acknowledge customer data was removed from the Service Loaner product by the Field Service Engineer. Please check this box to verify that the hard drive of the Service Loaner has been re-imaged or replaced.
CustomField.label: Customer Data Removed from Loaner?
